text: "Say Say Say" is a song performed by Paul McCartney and Michael Jackson, released in 1983 as the lead single from McCartney's 1983 album Pipes of Peace. Produced by George Martin, it was recorded during production of McCartney's 1982 Tug of War album, about a year before the release of "The Girl Is Mine", the pair's first duet from Jackson's album Thriller (1982). It's a catchy pop track that features a blend of McCartney's melodic style and Jackson's rhythmic sensibility. The lyrics revolve around themes of love and communication.
title: Say Say Say
